sect2.title: Installation de Binutils
sect2.para: Vous pouvez maintenant supprimer les répertoires binutils-*.

screen.userinput: SPECFILE=/stage1/lib/gcc-lib/*/*/specs sed -e 's@/lib/ld.so.1@/stage1/lib/ld.so.1@g' \ -e 's@/lib/ld-linux.so.2@/stage1/lib/ld-linux.so.2@g' \ $SPECFILE > XX mv XX $SPECFILE unset SPECFILE
